__e: - Nick. Maybe we should untie him. 'Cause I want Sal and everybody else to know... - What?
Anybody else take my saddle, get it stole, you know what I'd do?
(UHTRED) I was expecting there to be a hall, and I find this.
- There's a saddle on my back.
They can't even get a saddle on the damn thing.
I had a dream like this but I had a saddle on and you were an Indian.
All right, well, with your pop the way he is, and now that Sal's gone, the families have concerns.
- I guess we got a deal, huh?
I'm not happy Sal is back. Angie!
Mounts up, we can't be far behind him.
Haven't any time to lose, so I'd be obliged if you'd saddle up.
